A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Excellent movie. Very pleased with the way it panned out and was very pleased to discover it wasn't a retread of Empire Strikes Back. I really can't understand the negativity it's receiving from certain people. I'm guessing its because its the society we live in now where everybody has to hate everything. We were a family of 4 of varied ages of young and old and we all loved it.
